name: Monster From Outer Space(LOWRES JAM 2022)
description:
Monster from outer space is a game made for the LowRes Game Jam of 2022(August).

It took me about 4 to 5 days to complete this thing and its really short and simple from the initial idea.

The core of the game is you have a monster that will chase you down after a set time, 

while the time is going down you can choose to plan out where to place down traps(not really, way too simple for that but just imagine it),

After which you have to make sure the monster runs into the trap so you can Set it on fire.

Do it 3 times and you win the game.

You have a big stick that you use as a make shift torch, make sure you can get to the camp fire in time to set the gasoline on fire.

You also have a gun thats practically useless, on occation it might stun the enemy for a short duration.

The only way to kill the monster is to set it on fire, so make sure you dont run out of gas or traps.

CONTROLS:

ESCAPE: Quits the game.

MOUSE 1: Primary attack.

SCROLL WHEEL: Switch Between Items.

WASD: Movement.

R: Reload the useless gun.

Don't step on the trap.🗿
